First projectVidly

app for renting movies

Vidly is small application for renting movies.Vidly is built with ASP.NET, MVC, C# and SQL.

The front end was developed with HTML, Javascript and Bootstrap. The backend utilizes MVC and C#. The database was built with SQL Server.
